template.subject: Request for Coverage: Iran Human Rights Crisis
template.body:
Dear Editor,

I am writing to request increased coverage of the humanitarian crisis in Iran.

Since December 28, 2025:
• Over 51 protesters have been killed by Iranian security forces
• More than 2,270 people have been detained
• A nationwide internet blackout has been imposed
• Live ammunition has been used against peaceful demonstrators

Canada is home to one of the largest Iranian diaspora communities in the world. Many Canadian families are directly affected by these events and are desperate for news about loved ones. Your coverage can:

1. Keep the Canadian-Iranian community informed
2. Document human rights violations
3. Support calls for Canadian government action
4. Maintain international attention on the crisis

I respectfully request that you dedicate resources to covering this developing situation.

With sincere appreciation,
A concerned citizen
